Data with D.content: Developed and optimized deep learning models using PyTorch, TensorFlow, and OpenCV, with a focus on producing high-quality generative outputs. Specialized in fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) such as OpenAI and OLama for tailored performance. Leveraged Docker for streamlined containerization and deployment, and utilized FFmpeg for multimedia processing along with colmap for 3D reconstruction. Also proficient in managing cloud infrastructure, optimizing resources on AWS (S3, EC2) to support scalable solutions.

GDSC AI/ML.content: As the AI/ML Lead for the Google Developer Student Club, I drive initiatives to build a collaborative environment where students can explore, learn, and implement AI and machine learning concepts. I conduct workshops, organize study jams, and lead hands-on projects to help members develop foundational skills in machine learning and artificial intelligence. By fostering an inclusive and innovative community, I aim to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application in AI/ML for students at all skill levels.

Innovaccer.content: As a Software Development Engineer at Innovaccer, I worked on building and optimizing scalable web applications across both the frontend and backend. On the frontend, I utilized React.js and Webflow to design and develop interactive, user-friendly interfaces that enhanced usability and overall experience. On the backend, I implemented robust server-side logic using Flask and Django, focusing on creating efficient and maintainable APIs to support large-scale data-driven systems. In addition to web application development, I also developed and deployed Python-based automation tools and internal platforms that streamlined workflows for the marketing team. These automation solutions significantly improved operational efficiency by reducing manual work and optimizing recurring processes.Throughout my job, I strengthened my foundation in full-stack engineering, emphasizing API development, performance optimization, and scalable architecture design. My work focused on delivering reliable, production-ready solutions that contributed to smoother cross-team operations and improved overall system performance.
